content: you hey guys DM crafter DM scotty here good
to have you with me today we are going to do a neck erotic
ritual and who among you wouldn't want to do a neck rhotic ritual right anyways
this ritual craft was I made it to show the progress that the players were
making when they were trying to defeat a ritual and I think it's really nice
visual representation of how the players could do that or it would give the
players progress on how they were doing that so let's go to the table and I'll
show you how I crafted the neck erotic ritual
you to start the neck rhotic ritual circle I
took a piece of thin cardboard I trace the CD in the center there and then I
traced around a little bit to give it an edge
for the next phase here I took the glue gun and I ran around just outside the
circle of the CD so that it wouldn't obstruct putting a CD in the center and
then I pulled out a little bit of hot glue just to give it some texture and
you'll see how that works out later on in the video
so here I have a picture of the CD on the base and you can see see it easily
fits into the base you
the idea behind the necrotic circle is I want to have a column of light coming up
from the center of the circle so I bought this LED bike light and I got
this at Dollar General was like a couple bucks but it's fairly small so it'll be
it'll be perfect from for our purposes here is a close-up of the LED light
itself and it had an attachment that would attach to your bike and I pulled
all that off now and had a couple nubs that would attach to that and I trim
those off the light itself with a wire cutter so it's not very pretty but it's
going to go inside a tube of neck rhotic light so you won't see it anyway now
this light just twists to activate so you just twist it and turns the light on
and I'll put this in the center of the tube and it'll light the two buttons so
now I'll go and show you what the tube looks like
to make the tube for the neck rhotic ritual
I used my clear plastic sheet and like I say you can get these anywhere you can
even pull these off the front of toys you know like doll babies and stuff have
those plastic sheets covering them you can use that and you could get this
stuff anywhere but this was a sheet that I came from a pack of plastic sheets
that you would put on an overhead projector but anyways it's the same
technique I did for the fire pots or the alchemical fire I just dragged the glue
gun back and forth I didn't do it on the inside edge sit on the outside because
I'm going to oil this up like a tube and I'll show you what that looks like in
the next picture so here's the two ball constructed I
took the LED light and wrapped it around it so it would be the right size for the
LED LED light to fit in it and then I just cut off the excess and glued it so
it would hook together and the the glue it hides the seam very well now I also
painted it with a metallic green because I want to get that kind of necrotic
green and I also use a little bit of a goal on it as a dry brush
you the next step was to start detailing the
circles so I spray them with the brown texture paint and it give a nice dirt
texture I also did a little bit of dry brushing on it to just give it some
added interest now you can see I have the original which is the base and I
just kind of pulled out some black from the center that's kind of signifying the
spell is gone so when the spell is ended I'll pull the piece up and it will
disappear now I've got two versions of the spell as the spell weakens I've got
one with a full disc and one with the second disc where it's starting to
diminish now I did those kind of black tendrils coming out from the center
because I want to kind of highlight those with a little bit of like neck
rotted green and you'll see the next picture what I'm talking about
in this picture you can see why I wanted to paint the black tendrils because I'm
using that very light green over the black so you can see it really gives a
definition to those green tendrils here's our completed ritual base and the
ritual as the ritual is powered it fills the entire base so you can see there
some of the detail I painted on their hand paint on their I think it came out
really neat so that just fits right in the center of that circle there now I
have the neck product light I have the tube of necrotic energy and then I have
my light so I just twist it but throw me just twist it and put that on top and
you can see the light just shines up through that neck rhotic column which i
think is really cool so in play as the neck Radek rituals rose reduced I just
removed this and put the smaller one in there let me give you a look at this so
there you can see a little bit more detail on there so I made it like it was
it was coming into the center so then just that just puts that there and then
I put the ritual light back on and then as you as the players defeat the ritual
you can remove this last one and then the light itself so I just really think
that's a great little representation of the progress that the players are making
and it was really super easy to make not very expensive and I'll see you next
time on the craft you
here I want to show you some pictures of the actual neck product ritual and use
in my games and you can see the player is approaching the gates to the cemetery
and their ritual in the center I also have mine mausoleums in there which I've
done a video on here's the reverse view from the DM side
and as the players approached I explained how they could see the light
shooting into the sky and that the fog fog was rolling off of the graveyard and
the some of the neck rhotic energy was leeching off from the ritual into the
mausoleums the spires and the mausoleums and you can see as the players enter the
graveyard I had zombies approaching from either side
here's a closer picture and I also had it as the players past the neck erotic
ritual that it attacked them and drained some of their life energy off so that
was kind of a fun little thing because they were trying to stay towards the
center of the graveyard and avoid the zombies that were slowly shambling in
here we have the players scurrying for the mausoleums as they figure out that
